query:
SELECT 
                account_index,
                token_index,
                amount,
                decimal
            FROM (
                SELECT 
                    account_index,
                    token_index,
                    amount,
                    decimal
                FROM plt_accounts
                WHERE $2 < account_index AND account_index < $1 AND token_index = (
                    SELECT index FROM plt_tokens WHERE token_id = $3 LIMIT 1
                )
                ORDER BY 
                    CASE WHEN $4 THEN amount END ASC,
                    CASE WHEN NOT $4 THEN amount END DESC
                LIMIT $5
            ) AS subquery
            ORDER BY amount DESC
